HeroSection.heroDescription: Connect, celebrate, and create memories. Our platform makes it easy to discover and organize events that bring people together.
HeroSection.feature1Description: AI-powered event scheduling that adapts to your preferences and availability.
HeroSection.feature2Description: Connect with like-minded people and build lasting relationships.

FeaturesSection.featuresDescription: Everything you need to build and manage thriving communities
FeaturesSection.featuresCTA: Open source and built for community builders

Privacy.policy1: Nuestra política de privacidad tiene como objetivo que nuestros clientes conozcan cómo tratamos y protegemos sus datos personales ya que para nosotros es sumamente importante hacerlo. Tenemos un compromiso con el cumplimiento de la normativa vigente establecida en la Ley N° 29733, Ley de Protección de Datos Personales y su Reglamento, como también con los términos de esta política. Por lo tanto, es esencial que conozca y acepte todos los detalles de esta Política de Privacidad (en adelante, la 'Política').
Privacy.services: ANDINO LABS uses the Platform to provide the Services.
Privacy.policy2: ANDINO LABS SAC (hereinafter 'ANDINO LABS') with RUC No. 20609991080 with fiscal address in Lima, Peru, is a company dedicated, among others, to the construction industry, creating the YIQI Ecosystem, as said term is described in the Terms and Conditions, for the acquisition and operation of the Tokens (the 'Services').
Privacy.policy3: The contracting, registration and access to the Platform and use of the Services implies that the User gives his/her unequivocal, express, free and informed consent for the inclusion, use and processing of his/her personal data by ANDINO LABS.
Privacy.acceptance: Likewise, consent may be required by clicking 'acceptance' of this Policy.
Privacy.policy4: Data is collected automatically whenever you access the Service through any device ('Usage Data'). This data may include information such as your computer's or mobile device's Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address), browser type, browser version, mobile operating system and version, the pages of our Services that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers and other diagnostic data.
Privacy.policy5: ANDINO LABS has the right to modify, update or complete this Policy at any time. The effective date is indicated at the beginning of this Policy. Therefore, it is the User's responsibility to periodically review this Policy to be informed of its most updated version.
Privacy.policy6: If the User does not agree with the implemented changes, he/she must immediately cancel his/her Registration and refrain from using the Platform. If the User does not carry out this cancellation or continues using the Platform, he/she will be deemed to have agreed to the new Policy.

Networking.networkingProfileDescription: Help us create meaningful connections for you by sharing more about your professional journey. This information will be used to match you with relevant opportunities, events, and other professionals who share your interests and goals.
Networking.networkingBenefits: Benefits include personalized event recommendations, curated networking opportunities, and tailored content based on your professional profile.
Networking.professionalMotivationsPlaceholder: Share what fuels your passion—innovation, leadership, helping others, personal growth...
Networking.communicationStyleLabel: How would you describe your communication and interaction style?
Networking.communicationStylePlaceholder: Are you more of a listener or speaker? Do you prefer collaboration or independent work?
Networking.professionalValuesLabel: What values guide your professional life?
Networking.careerAspirationsLabel: What are your long-term professional goals?
Networking.significantChallengeLabel: Share a significant professional challenge you've overcome
Networking.significantChallengePlaceholder: What was the challenge and what did you learn from it?
Networking.editResume: Edit Your Resume (PDF, TXT or DOCX)
Networking.aiGeneratedProfileDescription: Based on the information you provided, we've generated a detailed profile to help you connect with like-minded professionals.
Networking.processingTimeWarning: Note: Processing your profile takes about 1 minute. Please do not leave this page until completion.
Networking.aiProfileExplanation: This profile was generated by AI based on your resume and questionnaire responses. It helps us match you with relevant opportunities and professionals.
Networking.processingTimeModalNotice: This process can take up to a minute to complete. Please don't close this window.
Networking.profileBenefitsExplanation: Once your profile is processed, our system will help you find the right people to talk to at events. In the future, it will also recommend specific events where you can meet people who align with your professional goals.
